name: Enlit
description:
Enlit is a small game I made for Ludum Dare 50 based on the inevitability of thoughts and delaying them.

You play as a small mouse turning on lights in towers. Getting to the last one won't be easy.

Controls are fairly simple, and accessible. Although I don't have re-bindability.
You can play on gamepad/keyboard, the keyboard has multiple variants for the same controls.

Keyboard : WASD/Arrow keys & space/enter/z

Gamepad: Arrow Pad/A button (whichever is the bottom one for your controller)

All art and code was done during the jam. However, the Audio was not.
